Detailed Description

Like its base class feature item, a value item encapsulates a feature. However, value items are restricted to hold features of type Property, because the property represents the actual value of a value item. Further, a PropertyDescriptor can be specified for a value item, in order to specify the representation of the properties value.

BOOLEAN IndicatorItem::Execute (   )  [virtual]
 

Simple value items can not be triggered. Thus, this method returns TRUE.

Reimplemented from FeatureItem.
